description: The Kings of Manhattan cocktail dates back to the early 1900s. It is made with a bourbon or rye&nbsp;whiskey base, sweet&nbsp;vermouth, and a dash of Angostura&nbsp;bitters.There are only a few high-quality ingredients required to enjoy a drink with the adjective "king." You can substitute Angostura bitters or Regan's orange bitters for the last dash.
keywords: How To Make Kings Of Manhattan
name: Kings Of Manhattan
recipeIngredient: ½  oz. Carpano antica formula vermouth

recipeInstructions.name: Stir ingredients over ice until exceedingly well-chilled and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Stir ingredients over ice until exceedingly well-chilled and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with brandied cherry on a cocktail pick.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with brandied cherry on a cocktail pick.
